text: to kya jo aagyaakaaree raha ho raatri ke kshanon mein sajda karate hue tatha khada rahakar, (aur) dar raha ho paralok se tatha aasha rakhata ho allaah kee daya kee, aap kahen ki kya samaan ho jaayenge jo gyaan rakhate hon tatha jo gyaan nahin rakhate? vaastav mein, shiksha grahan karate hain matimaan log hee
